graph.topic: effects of globalization (decrease in global tension)

nodes.text: Some people prefer to recognize globalization as a threat to ethnic and religious values of people of their country
the idea of globalization put their inherited culture in danger of uncontrolled change and make them vulnerable against the attack of imperialistic governments
globalization contribute effectively to the global improvement of the world in many aspects
Developing globalization, people can have more access to many natural resources of the world
it leads to increasing the pace of scientific and economic promotions of the entire world
globalization can be considered a chance for people of each country to promote their lifestyle through the stuffs and services imported from other countries
the proponents of globalization idea point out globalization results in considerable decrease in global tension
convergence of benefits of people of the world which is a natural consequence of globalization
I would rather classify myself in the proponents of globalization as a speeding factor of global progress
it is more likely to solve the problems of the world rather than intensifying them
